name: Pinnacle Rewards & Recognition
description: Pinnacle customers are brands and leaders who believe in recognition and appreciation and want to build a happy workplace. They want to give the best to their people instead of just organising a recognition event. Over 2700 brands have trusted us in the last two decades to make their people, their customers, their channel partners and even their friends and family feel special, feel appreciated - making people feel they matter.
Headline: Making people feel they matter
ShortDescription: Pinnacle helps companies get the most from their recognition and appreciation programs.
enhanced_description: Pinnacle Rewards & Recognition is a platform designed to help brands and leaders foster a happy workplace by providing meaningful recognition and appreciation. Launched in 2000, it goes beyond traditional recognition events, aiming to give the best to people and make them feel special and valued. The platform supports recognition initiatives for a broad range of stakeholders, including employees, customers, channel partners, and even friends and family. Its features include gifting with customized mementos, the ability to redefine achievement, and customizable design options. Categorized under Total Rewards, Pinnacle also offers capabilities related to employee recognition software, performance management systems, and benefits administration services, directly contributing to improved employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Gifting and rewards for various stakeholders (employees, customers, channel partners, friends, family)
competitive_advantages: Two decades of experience and trust in the market (since 2000)
Broader scope of recognition beyond employees, including customers, channel partners, friends, and family
Focus on delivering comprehensive appreciation programs rather than just organizing singular recognition events
Capabilities for customized gifting and design to tailor recognition experiences
roi_benefits: Enhanced sense of value and appreciation among employees and other stakeholders
Optimized effectiveness of recognition and appreciation programs
